header.title: <This should be title of the web site>
header.image_search_prompt: Text to use for stock image search of brand logo

intro.heading: heading for page
intro.description: 2-3 line description ab out the basis

links.button_icon: One of the 12 icons: (need to type all icons here)

services_section.button_label: Each service will have a button on ui and this label will be used for all services, For ex: Book this Service/Book
services_section.currency: currency unit to use one of USD, EUR, GBP

services.name: name of the service
services.price: integer value of price in unit defined above
services.image_search_prompt: Text to use for stock image search of Service being offered

images.image_search_prompt: Text to use for stock image search of Image being show for given description

product_section.main_button_label: Label for main button show to right of Heading, For example: Shope all
product_section.button_label: Each product will have a button on ui and this label will be used for all products, For ex: Buy/Buy Now
product_section.currency: currency unit to use one of USD, EUR, GBP

products.price: integer value of price in unit defined above
products.image_search_prompt: Text to use for stock image search of product being sold
